name: Use Math Module
description: Import and use the math module for constants and functions.
instructions: Run the code to see usage of the math module.
starter:
import math
print('Pi:', math.pi)
print('Square root of 16:', math.sqrt(16))

files./use_math.py:
import math
print('Pi:', math.pi)
print('Square root of 16:', math.sqrt(16))
